li.class: menu-item menu-item-type-custom menu-item-object-custom current-menu-item current_page_item menu-item-home menu-item-9

li.a: Student Privacy and Public Records Requests

p.span: Learning at home to Continue for Remainder of the School Year
On April 15, 2020, Governor John Bel Edwards announced an executive order that schools in Louisiana will stay closed for in-person instruction for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year.

ISL school closure had already been extended to April 30, 2020 with at home learning plans in place during this period. However, with this new executive order in effect from April 30th through the end of the 2019-20 school year, we must shift direction and approach.

We want to assure our ISL families that learning will continue to take place and we are already preparing for the end of this school year and the upcoming year. Our students are our priority and we will continue to work and adjust to support their learning and growth.

b.i: Please be on the lookout for an important letter from the Head of School that will be sent to families next week prior to Friday, April 24th.

p.span: This letter will include information and guidelines that will provide more structure, accountability, and consistency for teachers, students and parents for the remainder of the school year. We ask for your patience, pending the release of this information. We are hopeful that the information provided next week will answer many of your questions and concerns.

We were all hopeful that our students would be able to spend the last few weeks of the school year in the classroom with their teachers and classmates. I know many of us are disappointed. However, we support our state’s efforts to keep our community safe and we acknowledge that the health and safety of our students and staff is the top priority.

p.b: IMPORTANT MESSAGE FROM HOS: SCHOOL CLOSURE

div.p: March 31, 2020: An important message from Head of School has been posted on our website and emailed to ISL families. Please CLICK HERE to read.
TRANSLATION: Si necesita que le proporcionen una traducción de alguna información que aquí se encuentra, no dude en ponerse en contacto con Lucia Hammer (lhammer@isl-edu.org).

March 17, 2020: An important message from Head of School has been posted on our website. CLICK HERE TO READ. This letter has been emailed to all families to the email address listed under Primary Contact.
TRANSLATION: Si necesita que le proporcionen una traducción de alguna información que aquí se encuentra, no dude en ponerse en contacto con Lucia Hammer (lhammer@isl-edu.org).

hr.p: An important message from Head of School has been posted on our website. As per Governor John Bel Edwards’ proclamation, beginning on Monday, March 16, 2020 all Louisiana K-12 schools are closed through April 13, 2020. For additional information, please click here.

p.span: Gracias por visitar nuestro portal de internet. Si necesita que le proporcionen una traducción de alguna información que aquí se encuentra, no dude en ponerse en contacto con nosotros en
. Un miembro del personal de International School of Louisiana tendrá mucho gusto en ayudarle.
Merci de votre visite sur notre site internet. Si vous désirez de l’aide pour traduire les informations trouvées sur nos pages, n’hésitez pas à nous contacter à l’adresse suivante:
. Un membre de l’équipe de “International School of Louisiana” vous aidera avec plaisir.
